alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Inland Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Citrus County through 700 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Black Diamond to near Crystal River Airport to near Homosassa. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homosassa Springs, Crystal River Airport, Homosassa, Citronelle, and Crystal Manor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
